lightsOn.prompt: Turn on the lights in the room

lightsOff.prompt: Turn off the lights in the room

playNtsRadioOne.command: pkill vlc; pkill VLC; sleep 1; vlc --intf rc --rc-host localhost:12345 http://stream-relay-geo.ntslive.net/stream &

playNtsRadioTwo.command: pkill vlc; pkill VLC; sleep 1; vlc --intf rc --rc-host localhost:12345 http://stream-relay-geo.ntslive.net/stream2 &

playJazzFm.command: pkill vlc; pkill VLC; sleep 1; vlc --intf rc --rc-host localhost:12345 https://edge-bauerall-01-gos2.sharp-stream.com/jazzhigh.aac &
